sentences.en: " The courier will depart next day , she's told . She sews a warrior's gown all night. "
sentences.cn: 明朝驿使发, 一夜絮征袍.

sentences.en: A courier delivered the parcels ( to our office ).
sentences.cn: 送急件的人将包裹送来 ( 送到我们办公室 ) 了.

sentences.en: A courier was despatched with two sealed envelopes.
sentences.cn: 信使受命递送两封封讫的信。
亚历山大的女朋友是一名导游.

sentences.en: He was a courier for the Polish underground and parachuted into Warsaw.
sentences.cn: 他是波兰地下组织的情报员，被空降到华沙。

sentences.en: He worked as a motorcycle courier.
sentences.cn: 他的工作是骑摩托车送快递。

sentences.en: Swiss fans cheered Jakob Hlasek during yesterday's match with Courier.
sentences.cn: 昨天，瑞士球迷在雅各布·赫拉塞克对阵库里耶的比赛中为赫拉塞克喝彩加油。

sentences.en: The cheques were delivered to the bank by a private courier firm.
sentences.cn: 支票由私人快递公司送到了银行。

sentences.en: The courier had change for a £10 note.
sentences.cn: 快递员能破开10英镑的纸币。

sentences.en: The courier pinned a notice on the hotel notice board.
sentences.cn: 服务员在告示牌上贴了一条通知.

sentences.en: The courier will give him a million from the boss to disappear.
sentences.cn: 快递会给他一百万从老板到失踪.

sentences.en: The young courier looked ill at ease as he made answer.
sentences.cn: 那个小传令兵见问,似乎觉得有点不好回答.

sentences.en: There will be a messenger at the Airport to collect the photographs from our courier.
sentences.cn: 机场会有一名信使从我们的递送员手中取走照片。

sentences.en: They send the message via the courier.
sentences.cn: 他们通过信使传递信息.

sentences.en: We sent the documents by courier.
sentences.cn: 我们派了信使送交这些文件。

trans.tran_cn: 旅游团的服务员，导游，（传递信息或重要文件的）信使，通讯员
trans.tran_en: A courier is a person who is paid to take letters and packages direct from one place to another
